TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ludja, title = Ludja, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludja} }

S.FORM: Ludja i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Ludja. u kasalumaluma' nu Ludja sa, 42 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 184 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 175 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 9 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 93%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%.

Lodja i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Lodja. o kasalomaloma' no Lodja sa, 42 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 184 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 175 ko tademaw, pakalato 95%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 9 ko tademaw, pakalato 5%. o kasabinacadan, Paiwan 93%, Amis 1%, Bonon 1%.
